flavorText: You only need to wield it once to appreciate the power of control.

foreignData.flavorText: Du brauchst ihn nur einmal zu benutzen, damit du die Macht der Kontrolle zu schätzen weißt.
foreignData.name: Orzhov-Runenschlüssel
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {W} oder {B}.
{W}{B}: Der Orzhov-Runenschlüssel wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 1/4 weißen und schwarzen Thrull-Artefaktkreatur mit Lebensverknüpfung.

foreignData.flavorText: Basta con blandirla una vez para apreciar el poder del control.
foreignData.name: Llave rúnica orzhov
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega {W} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.{W}{B}: La Llave rúnica orzhov se convierte en una criatura artefacto Thrull blanca y negra 1/4 con la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Il suffit de la manier une fois pour en apprécier la pleine puissance.
foreignData.name: Runeclé d'Orzhov
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B} à votre réserve.
{W}{B} : La Runeclé d'Orzhov devient une créature-artefact 1/4 blanche et noire Srâne avec le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Basta impugnarla una volta per apprezzare il potere del controllo.
foreignData.name: Runachiave Orzhov
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.
{W}{B}: La Runachiave Orzhov diventa una creatura artefatto Thrull 1/4 bianca e nera con legame vitale fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: それを一回振るうだけで、支配力というものを理解できるようになる。
foreignData.name: オルゾフの魔鍵
foreignData.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{W}か{B}を加える。{W}{B}：オルゾフの魔鍵はターン終了時まで、絆魂を持つ白であり黒である１/４のスラル・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。

foreignData.flavorText: 이 열쇠를 한번만 다뤄봐도 남을 부리는 즐거움을 알게 된다.
foreignData.name: 오르조브 열쇠룬
foreignData.text:
{T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{W}{B}: 턴종료까지, 오르조브 열쇠룬은 생명연결 능력을 가지고 백색이며 흑색인 1/4 스럴 마법물체 생물이 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: Você só precisa empunhá-la uma vez para apreciar o poder do controle.
foreignData.name: Chave Rúnica Orzhov
foreignData.text: {T}: Adicione {W} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.{W}{B}: Chave Rúnica Orzhov torna-se uma criatura artefato branca e preta 1/4 do tipo Thrull com vínculo com a vida até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Достаточно лишь однажды подержать его в руках, чтобы проникнуться властью, которой он наделяет владельца.

name: Orzhov Keyrune
originalText:
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.
{W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.

rulings.text: multiple instances of lifelink on the same creature are redundant. Activating the last ability multiple times won’t cause you to gain more life.
Until the ability that turns the Keyrune into a creature resolves, the Keyrune is colorless.

Activating the ability that turns the Keyrune into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to another number, but effects that modify power and/or toughness without directly setting them will still apply.

text:
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.
